pr_title: #17763 : If the contentlet is being copied as Archived, then paste it…

timeline.message: #17763 : If the contentlet is being copied as Archived, then paste it as Archived in the destination Site too.

timeline.bodyText: deleted is delete and archived is archive, I think the name could be confused, even if archive is treated as a delete in some context, does not make sense in the code IMO
timeline.author: jdotcms

replies.bodyText: I agree. But I think the word "deleted" was used because the method used to archive a Contentlet is called: VersionableAPI.setDeleted(). Maybe @oarrietadotcms can confirm this?
replies.author: jcastro-dotcms
